text: Thomas Alexander Hickman (October 19, 1925 - January 11, 2016) was a Canadian lawyer, politician and judge. He was born in Grand Bank, Newfoundland. From 1966 to 1979, he was a member of the Newfoundland and Labrador House of Assembly. He held many cabinet positions including Minister of Justice and Attorney General, Minister of Health, Minister Responsible for Intergovernmental Affairs, Minister of Finance, and Minister of Education. Hickman died on January 11, 2016 at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== *Order of Canada Citation Category:1925 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Canadian politicians Category:Canadian judges Category:People from Newfoundland and Labrador
title: Alexander Hickman
